attributes.action: Prevent the postponing of the local elections currently planned for May 2025.
attributes.additional_details: Parliament must deny current Labour proposals to cancel elections because that would be undemocratic and a sinister precedent.
attributes.background: Proposals to cancel local elections for the first time since World War II are anti-democratic and should be prevented. Proposals to review local democracy can still go ahead alongside these elections so they should not be cancelled. It would be a very dangerous precedent.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Do not postpone the local elections
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710155
